nodes.bodyText: It might be clearer to move this section up before Building DPC, since it has to happen before you can build. Maybe Preparing to Build DPC with a subheader of Decrypting encrypted files?
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText: Good point! I saw it as the first step of the build process, but really it's separate from the build. Thanks!
